enables_user_action: User can navigate to /dashboard and view all uploaded files with their processing status, summaries, filtering by status, sorting by multiple fields, and expanding cards to see full summaries with topics, decisions, actions, and LNO task classification
notes: Full-stack vertical slice complete. Backend API with filtering and sorting. Frontend dashboard with responsive grid, accessibility features, and interactive controls. Manual testing required for full integration verification. All ShadCN components pre-installed. Prerequisites T001 and T002 complete.
